text: TALKING POINTS MEMO'S JOSHUA MICHA MARSHALL -- HILLARY GAVE A 'GOOD ANSWER' ON IRAN. "Hillary 'I will do everything I can' to prevent Iran from getting a nuclear weapon. Good answer." [Talking Points Memo, Joshua Micah Marshall 10/30/07 ] HUFFINGTON POST'S GLYNNIS MACNICOL -- 'HILLARY IS SO SHARP TONIGHT.'
title: Press Release - The Reviews Are In: 'Strong,' 'Sharp,' 'You Won't See Her Losing Her Cool'
